text: Clivina fossor is a species of ground beetle in the subfamily Scaritinae. It was described by Carl Linnaeus in 1758.Carl H. Lindroth 1974 Coleoptera. Carabidae. Handbooks for the Identification of British Insects Vol 4 Part 2. Royal Entomological Society,London pdf ==References== fossor Category:Beetles described in 1758 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Clivina fossor
